alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 22 at 7:49AM MST until March 22 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Tonto Basin, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains, Globe/Miami and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County; Tonto Basin
